name: Sosig ATTACK
description:
A minigame that made my PL_Mochi.

Sosig will drop form the sky and kill you, you need to focus on touching them to turn them into stone!

Four different mode: eazy to hard, and sosig mode.

music source: UnderTale OST by TobyFox & Music by Danimal Cannon
Undertale OST - Burn in Despair!/  Undertale OST 053 - Stronger Monsters/ Undertale OST 072 - Song That Might Play When You Fight Sans/  Undertale OST 032 - Run!/ Undertale OST 009 - Enemy Approaching.

Danimal Cannon Zef - Corrupted
